name: BeatGen NFT
description: What is the project about? BeatGen is The One App for sound and music producers, musicians, audiences and content creators, providing various solutions for sound and music streaming, remixing, editing, publishing, and more. What makes your project unique? 1. BeatGen Music Streaming - where music streaming service takes your listening experience to the next level. BeatGen features a cutting-edge AI-powered system, built on machine learning and in-depth analysis of sound and music, to comprehend music on a profound level, analyze all elements in each soundtrack, and ensure a seamless listening experience for users. 2. BeatGen Library This library contains a vast assortment of sounds, music samples, and loops that can be utilized to create a variety of musical genres. Our library is distinguished by its user-friendly interface, which makes it accessible and simple to use even by those with limited music production experience 3. BeatGen Studio BeatGen Studio, the ultimate soundtrack studio empowered with the most innovative AI and in-depth techniques to analyze soundtracks at element-based level. Users can now have complete control over their music; they can create music using a range of unique and customizable elements History of your project. The BeatGen NFT project was initially conceived when we start the development in 2021. Our official social are published in March 2023. The fundraising sale was conducted in April 2023. Whatâ€™s next for your project? The official listing of BeatGen is coming on April 2023. In Q2,2023 NFT Staking will be released and then we will have Studio Beta Launch, Mobile App Beta, and Commercial Service Release What can your token be used for? Utilities Gain access to exclusive community events Gain access to AI that helps in producing soundtracks Sell and transfer copyrights of soundtracks Create and own copyrights for the custom beat and music Rights to publish soundtracks to social platforms
